title: Survicate
description:
Survicate makes collecting and analyzing customer feedback effortless. 

Gather user insights through email, website, in-product, and mobile app surveys, and connect other feedback sources like reviews, support chats, interviews, and more. 

All your feedback lands in the Hub, where it gets categorized and analyzed automatically with AI, giving you meaningful, ready-to-use insights without the manual work.

Use the insights to improve your product and give your customers exactly what they want.
